article: palestinian president mahmoud abbas , addressing his people on tv wednesday , harshly criticized the islamic hamas for attacking `` national symbols '' during its takeover of gaza last week , referring to them as `` murderous terrorists .
abstract: abbas criticizes hamas for attacking national symbols dividing palestinian territories
